description.@en: When you brush your hand over the dead, your head fills with visions from their life. From both joyous and traumatic events of their personal history, your mind reels with memories of the life once lived by the corpse you touched.

effect.@en: When you touch a corpse, make a successful Incantation Test to learn three important facts about their past. However, you may only ever exert this power over an individual corpse once.
